item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 1, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. A faster way to copy SQLite databases between computers (159 points | 70 comments)
2. How to vibe code for free: Running Qwen3 on your Mac, using MLX (80 points | 51 comments)
3. Linkwarden: FOSS self-hostable bookmarking with AI-tagging and page archival (40 points | 15 comments)
4. Judge Rules Apple Executive Lied Under Oath, Makes Criminal Contempt Referral (155 points | 33 comments)

6. Trust Me, I'm Local: Chrome Extensions, MCP, and the Sandbox Escape (28 points | 8 comments)
7. Vanguard 50-year anniversary CEO letter (4 points | discuss)
8. Office is too slow, so Microsoft is making it load at Windows startup (408 points | 581 comments)
9. 108B Pixel Scan of Johannes Vermeer's Girl with a Pearl Earring (346 points | 101 comments)
10. RFK Jr. rejects cornerstone of health science: Germ theory (8 points | discuss)

20. Game preservationists say Switch2 GameKey Cards are disheartening but inevitable (21 points | 28 comments)
21. Zhaoxin's KX-7000 (164 points | 44 comments)
22. Xiaomi MiMo Reasoning Model (460 points | 175 comments)
23. NASA's Psyche spacecraft hits a speed bump on the way to a metal asteroid (8 points | discuss)

25. If you're in the market for a $1,900 color E Ink monitor, one of them exists now (18 points | 10 comments)
26. Home washing machines fail to remove important pathogens from textiles (87 points | 122 comments)
27. I Found Malware in a BeamNG Mod (140 points | 22 comments)
28. GroMo (YC W21) Is Hiring ( | hide)
